item.description:
Hello everyone,

I'm back and ready to get my game on! I hope to be bringing some cool games I've been playing in Florida. So anyway miss you guys and hope you'll consider hanging out. Food will be served. Let me know if you are bringing anything. Parking is on the street, CVS or funeral home parking lot. Not in front or the side of the house please.

 

Please remember to bring a $1.00 for Nina our awesome organizer.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Game night at Marguerrrriiitttaaas! Margueriiitttaaaa is back!
